name: OverLap (spooble)
description:
Delve through your neighbors Space time warping Shed to kill his dog (dog crapped on your lawn)


FullScreen Recommended 

W A S D to move. 

Mouse to shoot and aim
E to interact

Feed Back: https://forms.gle/Q98NSzCxynADLCcMA?

Discord: https://discord.gg/ESSgKYXRAb

Goal: Get the Crown
Music and boss art: _H_

Programming and main art: SQoot (me)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

a little bit about the game, I made it in a month of procrastination and i only really worked hard for like the last week. had about 3 hours of sleep all weekend.  And surprise surprise, its Still TERRIBLE!!!! 

Welcome to the break down of everything

ITEMS:

InchWorm (green worm) speeds up the character - Split (cut in half green  Skull) adds a extra bullet in the front - ForceField (little funny ipad thing) adds a damaging blue field around the character - RazorWorm(red worm with horns) lance does more damage towards enemies - hearty worm (normal worm) increases health by 1 - rocket worm (normal worm with a rocket on its back) speeds up player bullet - frog boots(green shoe with eyes) shoots feet projectile - ninja boots(black shoe with brown at the bottom and eyes ) shoots feet projectile - fire boots(red orange and yellow shoe shoe with eyes) shoots feet projectile - creamling ( blue icecream with face) slows running enemies -  shock bullet ( little black thingy with blue ) slows flying enemys - baby nyanfo (black cat ufo)  orbits around you while shooting at enemies - orb (purple orb ) orbits around you while shooting at enemies - Mad rose (angry flower with face) increases lance damage towards enemys and player health by 1 - LavaSwimmer ( robotic lava lamp thing with legs) activates fire projectile  behind the player
ENEMYS:

-Rollo ( green running guys ) just runs back and forth
-Nyafo ( flying red cat ufo ) flying enemy that shoots
-Trick Beholder ( smilling thingy that Opens its face like a Demogorgon at flings itself at you ) flys at you that speeds up when close
-Cherry Yogurt ( looks like unstirred cherry yogurt ) sits still and shoots, waiting for its death
-Specter(funny purple and green thingy ) it walks back and forth and shoots
-Crystal tongue demon ( purple boss thing ) runs really fast back and forth while shooting a plethora of bullets
